name: Something In The Tall Grass
description:
The Creature Containment Corps needs you!

You've been assigned to the remote grass seas in the Layoria region.

You've been issued a lantern, outdated revolver, a single battery, and a couple glow sticks.

The light is dimming fast, but Base Camp needs a few components that earlier agents lost along the way. Pick them up and get to Base Camp before the local population decides to come out.

  • Search each area for loot
  • Lights and batteries are activated when you drop them onto the ground.
  • You don't have to clear the entire area, just find the base camp component. But make sure you have enough gear to keep going.
  • You'll know when you make it to Base Camp. Be ready for a fight.
